customProperties.forgingConditions: Requires Proficiency in WIS Saving Throws, and Enchanted Smith's Tools.
customProperties.armorEffects: The wearer gains proficiency in Perception and gains a blindsight of 10ft.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Hitting a creature with an opposite alignment as you forces that creature to make a DC17 WIS Save, and on a fail incur a Short Term Madness for a number of rounds equal to Half of your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down).
customProperties.additionalEffects: Can be used to Craft Titanic Platemail.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Requires Proficiency in WIS Saving Throws, and Enchanted Smith's Tools.
Armor Effects: The wearer gains proficiency in Perception and gains a blindsight of 10ft.

Weapon Effects: Hitting a creature with an opposite alignment as you forces that creature to make a DC17 WIS Save, and on a fail incur a Short Term Madness for a number of rounds equal to Half of your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down).
Additional Effects: Can be used to Craft Titanic Platemail.
